Use this data source to get the ID of an IAM **custom policy**.

> You *must* have IAM read privileges to use this data source.


<div><pulumi-examples>

import (

)

func main() {

	})
}

<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#references_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">references</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The number of citations for the custom policy.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="type_python">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#type_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Display mode. Valid options are <em>AX</em>: Account level and <em>XA</em>: Project level.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="yaml">

            title="Optional">

        <span class="property-type">String</span>

            title="Optional">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The domain the policy belongs to.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

        <span class="property-type">String</span>

            title="Optional">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Display mode. Valid options are <em>AX</em>: Account level and <em>XA</em>: Project level.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>

	<dt>Repository</dt>
	<dd><a href="https://github.com/huaweicloud/pulumi-huaweicloud">https://github.com/huaweicloud/pulumi-huaweicloud</a></dd>

	<dt>Notes</dt>
	<dd><p>This Pulumi package is based on the <a href="https://github.com/huaweicloud/terraform-provider-huaweicloud"><code>huaweicloud</code> Terraform Provider</a>.</p>
</dd>
</dl>
